parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-0" /> <mxCell id="XgY4lxPiN6GVmBq9-WwZ-2" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="XgY4lxPiN6GVmBq9-WwZ-0" target="XgY4lxPiN6GVmBq9-WwZ-3"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="410" y="280" /> <mxPoint x="660" y="280" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="XgY4lxPiN6GVmBq9-WwZ-7" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="XgY4lxPiN6GVmBq9-WwZ-0" target="XgY4lxPiN6GVmBq9-WwZ-6"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="410" y="280" /> <mxPoint x="120" y="280" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="XgY4lxPiN6GVmBq9-WwZ-0" value="Atacante pode tirar proveito da barra de pesquisa de produtos" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#f5f5f5;fontColor=#333333;strokeColor=#666666;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="350" y="190" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="XgY4lxPiN6GVmBq9-WwZ-13" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="XgY4lxPiN6GVmBq9-WwZ-1" target="XgY4lxPiN6GVmBq9-WwZ-12"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="XgY4lxPiN6GVmBq9-WwZ-1" value="<font color="#000000">Injetar código SQL na barra de pesquisa, aproveitando-se de falhas de validação ou sanitização</font>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffe6cc;strokeColor=#d79b00;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="320" y="330" width="180" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="XgY4lxPiN6GVmBq9-WwZ-15" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="XgY4lxPiN6GVmBq9-WwZ-3" target="XgY4lxPiN6GVmBq9-WwZ-14"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="XgY4lxPiN6GVmBq9-WwZ-3" value="<font color="#000000">Inserir scripts maliciosos, comprometendo a segurança do sistema ou roubando informações confidenciais dos utilizadores</font>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffe6cc;strokeColor=#d79b00;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="550" y="330" width="240" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="XgY4lxPiN6GVmBq9-WwZ-11" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="XgY4lxPiN6GVmBq9-WwZ-6" target="XgY4lxPiN6GVmBq9-WwZ-10"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="120" y="450" /> <mxPoint x="120" y="450" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="XgY4lxPiN6GVmBq9-WwZ-6" value="<font color="#000000">Sobrecarregar o sistema com uma grande quantidade de solicitações de pesquisa maliciosas, tornando-o lento ou indisponível</font>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffe6cc;strokeColor=#d79b00;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="20" y="330" width="220" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="XgY4lxPiN6GVmBq9-WwZ-10" value="<font color="#000000">Implementar mecanismos de controlo de tráfego para limitar o número de solicitações que um único utilizador pode fazer num determinado período de tempo</font>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#d5e8d4;strokeColor=#82b366;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="470" width="240" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="XgY4lxPiN6GVmBq9-WwZ-12" value="<font color="#000000">Implementar validação&nbsp;dos dados de entrada</font>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#d5e8d4;strokeColor=#82b366;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="350" y="470" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="XgY4lxPiN6GVmBq9-WwZ-14" value="<font color="#000000">Aplicar filtragem de entrada para remover caracteres especiais e evitar a execução de scripts maliciosos</font>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#d5e8d4;strokeColor=#82b366;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="560" y="470" width="220" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
